pages.text: $(item)Waystones$() are infused with ender-energy, making them able to store locations.$(br)This in turn allows them to redirect $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)rituals$(), casting them in a different place.$(br2)$(o)To redirect a ritual, use the Waystone on the Golden Chalk after the ritual has been started$().
Recipes that require Waystones will usually assume that the Waystone has already been bound.
